data.actual_result: Don't resize and then we have a popup out of the space it must be
data.short_description: click on the name of a person and change the size from big to small won't resize the popup
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1) Go to a discord server and put discord in a bigger size, like double clicking on it and it will be in fullscreen - Step 2) Click on a person then you will have him roles, name etc.. - Step 3)Go resize to a smaller size
